class.name: EditorTranslationParserPlugin
class.brief_description: Plugin for adding custom parsers to extract strings that are to be translated from custom files (.csv, .json etc.).

method.name: get_recognized_extensions
method.description: Gets the list of file extensions to associate with this parser, e.g. [code]["csv"][/code].

method.name: parse_text
method.description: Override this method to define a custom parsing logic to extract the translatable strings.
